posts.post_content:
Hi,
I have hundreds of T206 cards available in all grades.  Any interest?
Thanks, Andy Sandler       [url]andy@allsportsauctions.com[/url]

Hi Andy

Yes, I'm interested

Could you email me a list or link to what you have available?

[url]smorey@neo.rr.com[/url]

Thanks

Jantz
Can you email me a list ? Are they graded or raw ? [url]josh.buckley0528@gmail.com[/url]

I'm interested also.  I'm looking to buy a large quantity of t206s if possible.   Can u send a list of cards, grades and prices?

[url]Kardboys@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks in advance 
Bob I.
Sorry Andy, you seem like a really nice guy but this is kind of a lame hook, when I email you about these and you respond to register for your next auction.
Sorry, I put this in the wrong section.  I have asked Leon to move it.

Hi Andy,

Email sent.

Thanks,

Dave

[quote name="ATP" post=1385858]Sorry Andy, you seem like a really nice guy but this is kind of a lame hook, when I email you about these and you respond to register for your next auction.[/QUOTE]

Really?

[quote name="ATP" post=1385858]Sorry Andy, you seem like a really nice guy but this is kind of a lame hook, when I email you about these and you respond to register for your next auction.[/QUOTE]

Yup he emailed me too with same.  I don't know if it was a mistake since he did the same thing in the other T section of BST for t205's and t207's.  Poor excuse.
